short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improved design and functionality of the LearnIT page for IT-University Of Copenhagen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improves the UI of LearnIT for ITU students with features like:
- Themes (Dark mode)
- Analog opening hours
- Student council events
- Quality of life improvements
